OK, so I guess it's time for me to get serious about finding a nice T205 Walter Johnson for my collection.

Feel like it's the obvious next choice to join this group, so let me know what you've got and let's see if we can make a deal.

Preferably looking for PSA or SGC in the 3-5 grade range.

PM or email to [url]david@davidratliff.com[/url]

Looking forward to it!


[img]https://i.imgur.com/z3fkYEql.jpg[/img]

Those are some amazing cards . Thanks for sharing
